data.title: Deepfake CEO impersonation scam costs UK company $25 million
data.snippet: Criminals use AI-generated video and voice deepfakes to impersonate a CEO in a video call, convincing finance staff to authorize fraudulent wire transfers.

data.title: FTC reports $12.5 billion lost to fraud in 2025, up 25% from prior year
data.snippet: The Federal Trade Commission's annual report shows investment scams and impersonation fraud as the fastest-growing categories of consumer financial loss.

data.title: India's cyber crime portal receives 4 million fraud complaints in 2025
data.snippet: The National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal records unprecedented volumes of complaints, with UPI fraud and impersonation scams dominating reports.

data.title: Instagram impersonation accounts target small businesses for phishing attacks
data.snippet: A coordinated campaign creates fake Instagram business profiles to trick customers into entering payment information on fraudulent websites.

data.title: AI voice cloning enables new wave of phone scams impersonating family members
data.snippet: Scammers use AI to clone voices of family members from social media clips, calling relatives with fake emergency scenarios to extort money.
